com.hazelcast.cache.impl

Interface SplitBrainAwareCacheRecordStore

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICacheRecordStore
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CacheRecordStore

    public interface SplitBrainAwareCacheRecordStore
extends ICacheRecordStore
    Contract point for ICacheRecordStore implementations which are handled in split-brain.
    See Also:
    CacheRecordStore, CacheEntryView, CacheMergePolicy

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.hazelcast.cache.impl.ICacheRecordStore

        UNIT_PERCENTAGE

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CacheRecord merge(CacheEntryView<Data,Data> cacheEntryView, CacheMergePolicy mergePolicy)
      Merges given record (inside given CacheEntryView) with the existing record as given CacheMergePolicy.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.hazelcast.cache.impl.ICacheRecordStore

        clear, close, contains, destroy, evictIfRequired, get, getAll, getAndPut, getAndRemove, getAndReplace, getCacheStats, getConfig, getName, getReadOnlyRecords, getRecord, init, invoke, isWanReplicationEnabled, iterator, loadAll, put, putIfAbsent, putRecord, remove, remove, removeAll, removeRecord, replace, replace, size

    • Method Detail

      • merge

        CacheRecord merge(CacheEntryView<Data,Data> cacheEntryView,
                CacheMergePolicy mergePolicy)
        Merges given record (inside given CacheEntryView) with the existing record as given CacheMergePolicy.
        Parameters:
        cacheEntryView - the CacheEntryView instance that wraps key/value for merging and existing entry
        mergePolicy - the CacheMergePolicy instance for handling merge policy
        Returns:
        the used CacheRecord if merge is applied, otherwise null
